title: GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_COUNT
content:
0xA2737C2C// GetInteriorRoomCount
int GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_COUNT(int interiorId);Parameters:interiorId: The target interior.Returns: The amount of rooms in interior.Examples:Lualocal playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local count = GetInteriorRoomCount(interiorId)
  print("interior " .. interiorId .. "has " .. count .. " rooms")
end
codeBlocks:
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local count = GetInteriorRoomCount(interiorId)
end
